candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (3 votes): groq: HUT is a Bitcoin mining stock with high volatility, similar to MARA. Weakness in 2024 (~35% decline) from energy costs and crypto winter mirrors goldmine patterns, but mean reversion potential is high with hash rate expansions and cycle bottoms. Aligns with crypto/commodity exposure; sector rotation into mining on halving events supports bounce.
